articles.description: Asia Cup 2022: Former Pakistan pacer Shoaib Akhtar and former Afghanistan Cricket Board chief Shafiq Stanikzai were involved in a heated exchange on Twitter after unruly scene broke out between fans of both team in Sharjah.

articles.title: Apple unveils new gadgets, including iPhone 14 and watches - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Pre-orders open at 8pm Singapore time on Sep 9, with the iPhone 14 priced from S$1,299 for the 128GB option and the iPhone 14 Plus, which has a bigger screen, priced from S$1,499.
articles.content:

articles.title: Asia’s rich are parking their wealth in ‘safer’ assets as global risks grow - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Swiss private bank Lombard Odier’s study found that the rich in Asia are steering clear of digital assets like cryptocurrency and sticking to private markets, ‘safer’ assets like gold amid current market risks.
